SHARING_PERIOD.TITLE: Sharing period
SHARING_PERIOD.HOW_OFTEN: How often your data will be shared
SHARING_PERIOD.HOW_OFTEN_ANSWER: Your data will be shared on an on-going basis during this period

CDR.CONFIRM_DATA_SHARING_WITH_MERCHANT_TOP: Please confirm that you agree to share the following data with {{merchantName}}.
CDR.CONFIRM_DATA_SHARING_WITH_MERCHANT_BOTTO: Do you confirm that we can share your data with {{merchantName}}.?

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Select account to share
ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_REQUEST: {{merchantName}} is requesting data from your accounts.

PERMISSIONS.TITLE: Data requested
PERMISSIONS.bank:accounts.basic:read:
Basic Bank Account Data

This scope would allow for the third party to access basic information of the customer’s accounts.

  • Includes simple account information including balance.
  • Does not include account identifiers, product information or transaction data.
PERMISSIONS.bank:accounts.detail:read:
Detailed Bank Account Data

This scope would allow for the third party to access detailed information of the customer’s accounts. This scope is effectively additional authorisation to the Basic Bank Account Data scope. Granting this authorisation only makes sense if the Bank Account Data scope is also authorised.

  • Includes basic account information plus account identifiers and product information.
  • Does not include transaction data.
PERMISSIONS.bank:transactions:read:
Bank Transaction Data

This scope would allow the third party to access transaction data for accounts. This scope is effectively additional authorisation to the Basic Bank Account Data scope. Granting this authorisation only makes sense if the Basic Bank Account Data scope is also authorised.

  • Includes all account transaction data.
PERMISSIONS.bank:payees:read:
Bank Payee Data

This scope allows access to payee information stored by the customer.

  • Includes payee information such as billers, international beneficiaries and domestic payees.
PERMISSIONS.bank:regular_payments:read:
Bank Regular Payments

The scope would allow the third party to access regular payments. Includes Direct Debits and Scheduled Payments.
PERMISSIONS.common:customer.basic:read:
Basic Customer Data

The scope would allow the third party to access personally identifiable information about the customer. For retail customers this would be information about the customer themselves. For business customers it would imply the name of specific user but also information about the business.

  • Includes name and occupation for individuals or name, business numbers and industry code for organisations.
PERMISSIONS.common:customer.detail:read:
Detailed Customer Data

The scope would allow the third party to access more detailed information about the customer. Includes the data available with the Basic Customer Data scope plus contact details.

  • Includes basic data plus phone, email and address information.

FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Funds Availability requested by {{merchantName}}
FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.ACCOUNT: We have received a request from card issuer to provide a confirmation of sufficient funds from the following account.
FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.CONFIRM_TEXT: Please confirm that you would like us to respond to future confirmation of funds requests from the card issuer.
FUNDS-CONFIRMATION.DISCLAIMER: Please note that the card issuer will never see your account balance. We will only provide a 'yes' or 'no' answer to the card issuer when you use your card.

FREQUENCY.IntrvlWkDay: Every {{weekNumber}} week, on the {{dayNumber}} day of the week.
FREQUENCY.WkInMnthDay: Every month, on the {{weekNumber}} week of the month, and on the {{dayNumber}} day of the week.
FREQUENCY.IntrvlMnthDay: Every {{monthNumber}} month, on the {{dayNumber}} day of the month.
FREQUENCY.IntrvlMnthDayFromEndMonth: Every {{monthNumber}} month, on the {{dayNumber}} last day of the month.

QtrDay.ENGLISH: Paid on the 25th March, 24th June, 29th September and 25th December.
QtrDay.SCOTTISH: Paid on the 2nd February, 15th May, 1st August and 11th November.
QtrDay.RECEIVED: Paid on the 20th March, 19th June, 24th September and 20th December.
